actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that four publications detailing the history of the Indian tribes of Nevada shall be subject to copyright by the Inter-Tribal Council of Nevada.

summary.text: Stipulates that four specified publications on the Northern and Southern Paiute, the Washoe, and the Western Shoshone) detailing the history of the Indian tribes of Nevada shall be subject to copyright by the Inter-Tribal Council of Nevada, the author of such publications.

titles.title: A bill to provide that four publications detailing the history of the Indian tribes of Nevada shall be subject to copyright by the Inter-Tribal Council of Nevada.
